pages.text: Whenever you pick up one of those little green orbs that appear whenever you kill an enemy, you get smarter - supposedly.\\However, the inevitable death by clumsiness means that you always lose this experience quickly. Crystallized and safely stored in your chests, however, they will be as safe as can be.

pages.title: Pedestal Recipe
pages.text: A Gem holds up to 10,000 experience. [Enchanting](entry://enchanting/enchanting_items) it with [#](449900)Efficiency[#]() increases that limit, [#](449900)Quick Charge[#]() boosts the pushing/pulling of XP.

pages.title: XP Orb Absorption
pages.text: Putting a Knowledge Gem into a [Black Hole Chest](entry://magical_blocks/black_hole_chest) allows it to absorb XP orbs, putting the experience into the Gem.
